name: Roundabout: Sports Car Sim
description:
Start your career as a test driver and put slick, amazing cars through their paces in this realistic and fun driving simulator!

Featuring authentic environment and plenty for you to learn and accomplish!

FEATURES:
▶ UNIQUE CARS TO DRIVE: choose one of the three distinct vehicles
▶ REALISTIC ENVIRONMENT: explore the city Driving Test Centre including a huge roundabout
▶ DYNAMIC TRAFFIC: learn to adapt & react to other drivers
▶ DOZENS OF CHALLENGING TASKS: show your driving profficiency
▶ CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE: easy modes and other modifiers available

Take the amazing cars featured in the game for a Driving Test! Each of the available vehicles has its own unique handling demands, so you'll have to use your full skillset to master every Mission!

The game features a realistic roundabout at the heart of the Driving Test Centre, dynamic traffic to mingle with and intense action from start to finish. Do you have the dedication required to pass your Car Driving Test?

Start with the Hot Hatchback. A nimble and responsive little car that’s fun to learn. Move on to the large saloon car. Those gaps will suddenly seem a lot smaller! Then take the ultimate test in the stunning Supercar. Don’t let the speed and power catch you out.

Tons of fun missions and all totally Free to play for the entire Career Mode!
